titles.title: Providing amounts for the Republican Steering Committee and the Democratic Policy Committee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Provides funds to the Republican Steering Committee and the Democratic Policy Committee from amounts previously appropriated for other purposes under the appropriation for salaries and expenses of the House of Representatives for FY 1995.
